pages.text: $(italic)You've already used your anvil (lots of anvils, to be precise) plenty. However, both $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$(/l), repairing and enchanting tools always damage them so quickly that they become irreparably damaged.$(br)To make the anvil more durable - or even indestructible - Bedrock seems like the perfect choice.

$(br2)The Bedrock Anvil allows you to rename items for a cost of zero. In addition, you can also add descriptions to your items.$(br2)$(italic)Tip: you can use "\n" to split your text into multiple lines.
